Uses of Class
pyramid.plunder.Drawable

    • Uses of Drawable in pyramid.plunder

      Subclasses of Drawable in pyramid.plunder 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Background
      The background of the game is drawn and imported; this Background Class extends the Drawable Class; it uses a for-loop to create the background with specified coordinates.
      class  Bat
      This Bat Class extends NPC; the location, size, health, attack, speed, damage, flight, and sightDistance of the Bat is implemented here in the game.
      class  Coin
      The class here creates the coin image in the game; Coin extends the PhysicsObject Class; this implements the size and the random locations for the game.
      class  EndCoin
      This EndCoin Class extends Coin; this class implements the images and values for the various coins the game.
      class  GameObject
      This abstract GameObject class extends the Drawable Class, major facets of the game are made and implemented here.
      class  HealthOrb
      This HealthOrb Class extends PhysicsObjecs; sets the location, implements game usage, and draws the orb.
      class  Loot
      This Loot Class extends the PhysicsObject; the image, the weapon, the int location and the int maxValue are implemented; the playability of the loot is also made.
      class  Mummy
      This Mummy Class extends the NPC; the random locations and characteristics of sprite images, health, armor, speed, attack, moveAtRest, and jump are implemented in the game.
      class  NPC
      This abstract NPC Class extends Player; the various characteristics for the player are implemented, such as speed, sightDistance, attack, movement, jumps, and rest, move, and attack Images.
      class  PhysicsObject
      This class creates guidelines for the physics behind movement in the game.
      class  Platform
      This Platform Class extends the PhysicsObject Class; this class passes down the image and creates the platform in the game.
      class  Player
      This Sword class extends PhysicsObject class; the various characteristics of the player are implemented, the player is drawn here through the Draw method and Graphics g, other important characteristics are also developed.
      class  Shader
      This Shader Class extends the Drawable Method; this class uses various for loops to create the background; the fade and time is also passed to this class.
      class  Snake
      This Snake Class extends the NPC; the random locations and characteristics of sprite images, health, armor, speed, attack, moveAtRest, and jump are implemented in the game.
      Methods in pyramid.plunder with parameters of type Drawable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void GameRunner.addDrawable(Drawable d)
      This GameRunner Class extends JPanel, which is used for the screens, and implements KeyListener, an important facet for the whole game.
      static void GameRunner.removeDrawable(Drawable d)
      This GameRunner Class extends JPanel, which is used for the screens, and implements KeyListener, an important facet for the whole game.
